transcribed_text: The Lord book the Moses sehen Commander children Visal and say to when you and to the Land of Canon Ende dieser Lotte to US in den Harit ich hab and close by These Bounty the South Side Show Beginn the Wildenis of Sinn wich das nächste idem ein Border on the Soul Seato the East denn the bound Go around the Sand of Aqua Beam Passantin ein Stand South of Kardashian From there the Boundary Shall Go On to Hazar Radar and Continuoto Ass One When the Bounty Shall turn from Ass One to the Broke of Egypt and andat the Grace See
